parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Balloon style as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Balloon size as defined in swBalloonFit_e

parameters.name: UpperTextStyle
parameters.description: Text style for the upper text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e

parameters.name: UpperText
parameters.description: Text string to be placed in the upper text of the balloon

parameters.name: LowerTextStyle
parameters.description: Text style for the lower text of the balloon as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e

parameters.name: LowerText
parameters.description: Text string to be placed in the lower text of the balloon
